text: Ivar Bengt Nilsson (12 June 1933 – 26 February 2019) was a Swedish speed skater. He was born in Göteborg, Sweden. He won a bronze all-round medal at the 1962 world championships. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Winter Olympics in 1,500 m, 5,000 m and 10,000 m events with his best achievement having been a fourth place finish in the 10,000 m event in 1960. Nilsson died on 26 February 2019 at the age of 85.Göteborgske skridskoikonen Ivar Nilsson död ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympians for Sweden
title: Ivar Nilsson
